headline: Helping Job Seekers Find Opportunities | Founder of InterviewPal | Product Manager at AltaML
summary:
My name is Aryan and I am a 4th year international student studying business at the University of Calgary. I came to Canada 3 years ago with no work experience, and no communication skills, and was filled with self-doubt. I was scared to talk to people and insecure about who I was. 

But, I had a vision that I wanted to make an impact in this world, and hence began my journey. I started my first work experience working at a few different restaurants as a host and server to improve my communication skills and get over the fear of talking to people. As time went on, I developed my skills and started attending networking events - this is when everything changed! 

In the last 3 years, I've had 15+ jobs in the business field and I got most of my jobs through unconventional job search methods. I rarely applied to any of the jobs I got!

But in May 2022, I was forced to take a break from university for 16 months because I didn't have enough money to go back to university. I did 4 internships in 16 months and 5 other part-time jobs at the same time to save up money. 


In the last 3 years, I have focused on 3 things:

1) Networking & Building Relationships
2) Developing & Improving Myself
3) Finding Opportunities in my Field 

What do I do right now?

I am currently a full-time student, working full-time at one of the fastest-growing start-ups in Canada, creating my start-up focused on helping job seekers, created a student club at UofC focused on product management, mentoring and coaching people on mastering the art of job-seeking, and raising awareness about job search strategies on LinkedIn! 

Now I am on a mission to help others explore unconventional strategies for finding a job. 

Are you looking to master the art of job seeking? Follow me on LinkedIn to stay updated with tips on job search strategies or send me a DM if you have any questions!

experiences.title: Associate Product Manager
experiences.description:
• Pioneered a groundbreaking product idea that leverages AI within the recruitment industry. Successfully pitched this concept to AltaML's venture studio, showcasing innovation and forward-thinking vision.

• Initiated the development of a startup, dedicating significant efforts to customer discovery. Conducted over 60 targeted discovery interviews with potential customers, strategically using questioning techniques to gain deep insights into their pain points and workflows. Committed to understanding the burning problems faced by target customers before building the product.

• Mastering the art of communicating with customers to extract valuable insights and data. Skillfully analyzing the data gathered during discovery interviews to make data-driven, strategic decisions as a Founder of the product, ensuring alignment with customer needs.

• Forging strategic partnerships with potential B2B customers to facilitate prototype testing, showcasing a proactive approach to market validation and product development.

• Meticulously crafting a comprehensive product plan, outlining the roadmap for developing the Minimum Viable Product (MVP). Utilizing strong project management and strategic thinking skills to ensure the successful execution of the product vision.

experiences.title: Business Consultant
experiences.description:
• Led the gathering and communication of business requirements to both internal and external stakeholders, elucidating how AltaML could seamlessly integrate machine learning solutions into clients' business processes and workflows, resulting in improved operational efficiency and informed decision-making.

• Spearheaded collaboration with 5 clients and worked with a team of 10 Machine Learning Developers to successfully conceptualize, develop, and deliver customized ML products by effectively communicating project findings and progress. 

• Demonstrated exceptional initiative by taking the lead in client meetings and delivering weekly presentations using Microsoft PowerPoint which played a pivotal role in maintaining transparency, fostering trust, and ensuring clients were well-informed about project progress.

• Collaborated closely with the project delivery manager in the creation and maintenance of project plans, expertly coordinating and facilitating client deliverables by leveraging strong organizational and communication skills.

• Acquired a deep understanding of AI use case formation from ideation to deployment. Assisted the product manager in conducting discovery interviews and utilized tools such as Miro and Figma to refine and validate concepts, resulting in well-defined and strategically aligned AI projects.

experiences.title: Founder
experiences.description:
InterviewPal is an AI-powered mock interview practice platform that provides you with customized interview questions and personalized feedback!

experiences.title: Founder & President
experiences.description:
The Product Society is a student-led club at UCalgary focused on mastering the art of product development and exploring unconventional job search strategies!

Through this club, I want to promote entrepreneurship by teaching students how the process of creating products!

experiences.title: Digital Analyst
experiences.description:
• Spearheaded successful implementation of multiple projects under the Canadian Digital Adoption Program (CDAP), assisting small and medium-sized businesses in their digital transformation journey.

• Conducted in-depth discovery interviews with clients, utilizing strategic questioning techniques to identify and analyze pain points hindering their business growth.

• Utilized effective communication skills to maintain regular client engagement and provide updates on project status, ensuring client satisfaction and project success.

• Leveraged extensive research to formulate data-driven recommendations, enabling clients to make informed decisions on the integration of digital technologies tailored to their specific needs.

• Demonstrated proficiency in crafting compelling presentations using Microsoft PowerPoint to convey project progress and strategic insights to clients, fostering transparency and alignment.

• Initiated and developed a text analysis tool to systematically map 100+ solutions previously offered to clients within the same industry facing similar challenges. Leveraged ChatGPT and honed prompt engineering skills to create a Python-based codebase.

experiences.title: Business Insights Analyst
experiences.description:
• Leveraged advanced SQL querying and Tableau visualization to analyze extensive attrition rate data, leading to data-driven recommendations

• Analyzed and dissected massive datasets exceeding 1 million rows, enabling the identification of crucial trends and correlations in turnover and hiring rates across various departments resulting  in insights for FY2023.

• Expertly employed Tableau to create visually compelling and informative dashboards, providing senior leaders with an intuitive understanding of complex data, ultimately influencing strategic decision-making.

• Utilized Microsoft PowerPoint to design and deliver engaging presentations, distilling key insights and trends related to attrition rates for stakeholders. These presentations facilitated data-driven discussions and strategic alignment.

• Collaborated seamlessly with cross-functional teams to gather critical insights for optimizing mandatory courses within the learning management system database, contributing to enhanced training programs and compliance.

experiences.title: Operations Coordinator
experiences.description:
• Led efforts to drive CAPTivate Gymnastics' growth by implementing innovative processes and strategies, contributing to enhanced operational efficiency and overall business development.

• Managed the registration and enrollment of a substantial roster of 200+ athletes within the Alberta Gymnastics Federation (AGF) using advanced Microsoft Excel skills, ensuring seamless administrative processes.

• Utilized Microsoft Excel to conduct in-depth data analysis of athlete records, creating key performance indicators (KPIs) that tracked critical metrics, including gross and net profit, expenses, retention rates, and coach-to-athlete ratios. These insights enabled data-informed decision-making and strategic planning.

• Implemented cutting-edge gymnastics software, streamlining registration, payment processing, and athlete tracking. This automation not only improved administrative efficiency but also enhanced the overall athlete experience and satisfaction.

• Produced engaging and visually captivating social media reels for CAPTivate Gymnastics, effectively elevating their online presence and engagement with the target audience.

experiences.title: Business Analyst and Program Coordinator
experiences.description:
• Orchestrated the end-to-end processing of grant applications, including high-profile programs like the Canadian Digital Adoption Program (CDAP), on behalf of company clients.

• Took the initiative in leading the design and development of cutting-edge systems and processes that aligned with and amplified business objectives. These innovations streamlined operations, enhanced efficiency, and ultimately contributed to increased profitability and client satisfaction.

• Spearheaded the creation of a comprehensive gap analysis report, meticulously identifying digital marketing gaps and opportunities for clients. 

• Leveraged strong problem-solving skills to address complex client challenges by collaborating closely with clients to gain a deep understanding of their unique needs and pain points, and offering tailored solutions that fostered client satisfaction.

experiences.title: Data Analyst
experiences.description:
• Demonstrated proficiency in writing highly optimized SQL queries to efficiently extract and manipulate data from the database, ensuring accurate and timely access to critical information for analysis and reporting.

• Leveraged a versatile skill set encompassing SQL, Tableau, and Excel to perform data visualization and analysis tasks. Created visually compelling and informative reports, dashboards, and presentations that empowered data-driven decision-making.

• Diligently identified and addressed data quality issues, ensuring the integrity and reliability of information used for analysis. Produced detailed weekly reports that provided valuable insights and played a key role in quality control measures.

• Actively engaged in team meetings, fostering a collaborative environment that promoted knowledge sharing and alignment on project goals. Contributed to discussions, shared insights, and collaborated with colleagues to collectively drive projects to successful outcomes.

volunteer_work.title: Event Coordinator
volunteer_work.description:
• Initiated and managed new events for organization.
• Decided venue, resources needed, organizations to partner with and number of invitees for the event.
• Delegated promotion activities with marketing team for events.
• Engaged with participants and members during events through different activities.

volunteer_work.title: Vice President Marketing
volunteer_work.description:
• Formulated, directed, and coordinated marketing activities and policies to promote events.
• Administered social media to engage consumers, respond to questions or complaints, and promote initiatives of the organization.
• Monitored social media metrics and tracking the growth of social media account.

volunteer_work.title: Corporate Relations Manager
volunteer_work.description:
• Maintained and established connections to AIESEC Alumni, external contacts, and other local commit tees.
• Reached out to industry professionals through cold calls, emails, and booking sales meetings with them.
• Focused on member development both professionally and personally.

volunteer_work.title: Director Of External Relations
volunteer_work.description:
• Member development throughout the semester to ensure members are growing personally and professionally.
• Delegated tasks to team members and motivated them to achieve goals for the semester.
• Empowered team members with skills to improve their confidence and communication skills by having weekly team meetings and individual conversations.
